description: This variable provides data on actual weekly working hours (including overtime) for all persons employed at the time of the survey (including the self-employed). The data are obtained by asking respondents how many hours they work on average per week.

The consumer price index for Germany measures the average price development of all goods and services purchased by private households for consumption purposes. [More  Information](https://www.destatis.de/DE/Themen/Wirtschaft/Preise/Verbraucherpreisindex/Methoden/Erlaeuterungen/verbraucherpreisindex.html)
